short_summary: Learn about your taxes: Intervention for high school students
description: This contract intends to award a single contract for the purpose of providing educational services to high school students. The Contractor will work with the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) to develop educational content and questions and answers in both English and French. The content will be based on the existing "Learn About Your Taxes" program, which is an online learning tool developed by the CRA.
full_summary:
### Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) Details

#### Contract Title and Description
*   **Contract Title-eng**: Learn about your taxes: Intervention for high school students
*   **Contract Title-fra**: Comprendre vos impôts : Intervention pour les étudiants du secondaire
*   **Contract Description-eng**: To implement an online educational program in Canadian secondary schools, aiming to:
	+ Imrove financial literacy
	+ Increase awareness of tax obligations
	+ Increase confidence to self-file amongst youth, 6th to 12th graders
*   **Contract Description-fra**: Pour mettre en place un programme éducatif en ligne dans les écoles secondaires canadiennes, en vue d'améliorer:
	+ la littératie financière;
	+ la sensibilisation aux obligations de l'impôt;
	+ la confiance de l'auto-préparation de DECLARE de revenus parmi les jeunes de 6 à 12.
#### Contract Requirements
*   The Contractor shall create content and questions and answers for the educational outreach program, in each official language
*   The program shall:
	+ Improve financial literacy
	+ Increase awareness of tax obligations
	+ Increase confidence to self-file amongst youth, 6th to 12th graders
*   The Contractor must:
	+ Develop questions and answers based on the existing 'Learn about your taxes' content
	+ Host the questionnaire on their online platform, accessible by students and the public who have registered on the ChatterHigh platform
	+ Provide usage reports, including:
		- Number of questions answered
		- Number of web pages visited
		- Percentage of questions answered correctly
*   Schools, school boards, and teachers shall also be provided with content, guidelines, and resources to implement the program
#### Prior Experience and Capabilities Required
*   The Contractor must demonstrate minimum 2 years' experience in creating and promoting interactive learning activities in schools across Canada
*   They must have:
	+ Completed at least 2 similar projects
	+ A pre-existing online platform to host the content
	+ Pre-existing relationships with at least 50 school districts across Canada
#### Project Timeline and Budget
*   The proposed contract duration is 2 years, with an option to extend for up to 3 additional years
*   The estimated total contract value is $353,946.52
